title: January 6 committee investigating Capitol tour given by GOP lawmaker on the eve of the insurrection - CNN
content:
1. January 6 committee investigating Capitol tour given by GOP lawmaker on the eve of the insurrection  CNN
  2. GOP lawmaker acknowledges letting people into Capitol complex day before Jan. 6 attack  POLITICO
  3. Jan. 6 panel wants answers from lawmaker it says led a Capitol tour before the attack  NPR
  4. Opinion | The Jan. 6 panel suggests GOP congressmen did give Capitol tours. That's a big deal.  The Washington Post
  5. Jan 6 committee says it has evidence of GOP-led ‘reconnaissance’ tours  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection said Thursday it has evidence that GOP Rep. Barry Loudermilk led a tour of the US Capitol complex the day before pro-Trump rioters stormed the building, according to a letter requesting the Republican lawmaker's voluntary cooperation with their ongoing probe.
